name: Longboard Stunts and Tricks
description: Thrilling longboard downhill race starts! Ride through the twisty serpentine track, perform cool tricks. Compete with the most skilled skateboarders in different racing modes and win!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2GHz Dual-core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1Gb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
